articles.title: PepsiCo to slash plastic use in sustainability push - Economic Times
articles.description: The Lays chips and Pepsi maker said it aims to reduce virgin plastic use per serving by half across all brands by 2030, and use 50% recycled content in all its plastic packaging, as part of a new initiative called  pep+ .
